17 enum PlyOutputTypes {
18  // The full SDF colorized by the distance in each voxel.
19  kSdfColoredDistanceField,
20  // Output isosurface, i.e. the mesh for sdf voxel types.
21  kSdfIsosurface,
22  // Output isosurface, i.e. the mesh for sdf voxel types.
23  // Close vertices are connected and zero surface faces are removed.
24  kSdfIsosurfaceConnected
25 };
26 
27 // Convert a voxel to a colored point. The sdf_color_range determines the range
28 // that is covered by the rainbow colors. All absolute distance values that
29 // exceed this range will receive tha max/min color of the rainbow range. The
30 // sdf_max_value determines if a point is generated for this value or not. Only
31 // SDF values within this max value result in a colored point.
32 template <typename VoxelType>
33 bool getColorFromVoxel(const VoxelType& voxel, const float sdf_color_range,
34  const float sdf_max_value, Color* color);
35 
36 template <>
37 bool getColorFromVoxel(const TsdfVoxel& voxel, const float sdf_color_range,
38  const float sdf_max_value, Color* color);
39 
40 template <>
41 bool getColorFromVoxel(const EsdfVoxel& voxel, const float sdf_color_range,
42  const float sdf_max_value, Color* color);
43 
44 // This function converts all voxels with positive weight/observed into points
45 // colored by a color map based on the SDF value. The parameter sdf_color_range
46 // is used to determine the range of the rainbow color map which is used to
47 // visualize the SDF values. If an SDF value is outside this range, it will be
48 // truncated to the limits of the range. sdf_max_value determines if a point is
49 // generated for this value or not. Only SDF values within this max value result
50 // in a colored point. If this threshold is set to a negative value, all points
51 // will be generated independent of the SDF value.
52 template <typename VoxelType>
53 bool convertVoxelGridToPointCloud(const Layer<VoxelType>& layer,
54  const float sdf_color_range,
55  const float sdf_max_value,
56  voxblox::Mesh* point_cloud) {
57  CHECK_NOTNULL(point_cloud);
58  CHECK_GT(sdf_color_range, 0.0f);
59 
60  BlockIndexList blocks;
61  layer.getAllAllocatedBlocks(&blocks);
62 
63  // Iterate over all blocks.
64  for (const BlockIndex& index : blocks) {
65  // Iterate over all voxels in said blocks.
66  const Block<VoxelType>& block = layer.getBlockByIndex(index);
67 
68  const int vps = block.voxels_per_side();
69 
70  VoxelIndex voxel_index = VoxelIndex::Zero();
71  for (voxel_index.x() = 0; voxel_index.x() < vps; ++voxel_index.x()) {
72  for (voxel_index.y() = 0; voxel_index.y() < vps; ++voxel_index.y()) {
73  for (voxel_index.z() = 0; voxel_index.z() < vps; ++voxel_index.z()) {
74  const VoxelType& voxel = block.getVoxelByVoxelIndex(voxel_index);
75 
76  // Get back the original coordinate of this voxel.
77  const Point coord =
78  block.computeCoordinatesFromVoxelIndex(voxel_index);
79 
80  Color color;
81  if (getColorFromVoxel(voxel, sdf_color_range, sdf_max_value,
82  &color)) {
83  point_cloud->vertices.push_back(coord);
84  point_cloud->colors.push_back(color);
85  }
86  }
87  }
88  }
89  }
90  return point_cloud->size() > 0u;
91 }
92 
93 template <typename VoxelType>
94 bool convertVoxelGridToPointCloud(const Layer<VoxelType>& layer,
95  const float sdf_color_range,
96  voxblox::Mesh* point_cloud) {
97  constexpr float kInvalidSdfMaxValue = -1.0f;
98  return convertVoxelGridToPointCloud<VoxelType>(
99  layer, sdf_color_range, kInvalidSdfMaxValue, point_cloud);
100 }
101 
102 // Converts the layer to a mesh by extracting its ISO surface using marching
103 // cubes. This function returns false if the mesh is empty. The mesh can either
104 // be extracted as a set of distinct triangles, or the function can try to
105 // connect all identical vertices to create a connected mesh.
106 template <typename VoxelType>
107 bool convertLayerToMesh(
108  const Layer<VoxelType>& layer, const MeshIntegratorConfig& mesh_config,
109  voxblox::Mesh* mesh, const bool connected_mesh = true,
110  const FloatingPoint vertex_proximity_threshold = 1e-10) {
111  CHECK_NOTNULL(mesh);
112 
113  MeshLayer mesh_layer(layer.block_size());
114  MeshIntegrator<VoxelType> mesh_integrator(mesh_config, layer, &mesh_layer);
115 
116  // Generate mesh layer.
117  constexpr bool only_mesh_updated_blocks = false;
118  constexpr bool clear_updated_flag = false;
119  mesh_integrator.generateMesh(only_mesh_updated_blocks, clear_updated_flag);
120 
121  // Extract mesh from mesh layer, either by simply concatenating all meshes
122  // (there is one per block) or by connecting them.
123  if (connected_mesh) {
124  mesh_layer.getConnectedMesh(mesh, vertex_proximity_threshold);
125  } else {
126  mesh_layer.getMesh(mesh);
127  }
128  return mesh->size() > 0u;
129 }
130 template <typename VoxelType>
131 bool convertLayerToMesh(
132  const Layer<VoxelType>& layer, voxblox::Mesh* mesh,
133  const bool connected_mesh = true,
134  const FloatingPoint vertex_proximity_threshold = 1e-10) {
135  MeshIntegratorConfig mesh_config;
136  return convertLayerToMesh(layer, mesh_config, mesh, connected_mesh,
137  vertex_proximity_threshold);
138 }
139 
140 // Output the layer to ply file. Depending on the ply output type, this either
141 // exports all voxel centers colored by th SDF values or extracts the ISO
142 // surface as mesh. The parameter sdf_color_range is used to color the points
143 // for modes that use an SDF-based point cloud coloring function.
144 template <typename VoxelType>
145 bool outputLayerAsPly(const Layer<VoxelType>& layer,
146  const std::string& filename, PlyOutputTypes type,
147  const float sdf_color_range = 0.3f,
148  const float max_sdf_value_to_output = 0.3f) {
149  CHECK(!filename.empty());
150  switch (type) {
151  case PlyOutputTypes::kSdfColoredDistanceField: {
152  voxblox::Mesh point_cloud;
153  if (!convertVoxelGridToPointCloud(
154  layer, sdf_color_range, max_sdf_value_to_output, &point_cloud)) {
155  return false;
156  }
157 
158  return outputMeshAsPly(filename, point_cloud);
159  }
160  case PlyOutputTypes::kSdfIsosurface: {
161  constexpr bool kConnectedMesh = false;
162 
163  voxblox::Mesh mesh;
164  if (!convertLayerToMesh(layer, &mesh, kConnectedMesh)) {
165  return false;
166  }
167  return outputMeshAsPly(filename, mesh);
168  }
169  case PlyOutputTypes::kSdfIsosurfaceConnected: {
170  constexpr bool kConnectedMesh = true;
171 
172  voxblox::Mesh mesh;
173  if (!convertLayerToMesh(layer, &mesh, kConnectedMesh)) {
174  return false;
175  }
176  return outputMeshAsPly(filename, mesh);
177  }
178 
179  default:
180  LOG(FATAL) << "Unknown layer to ply output type: "
181  << static_cast<int>(type);
182  }
183  return false;
184 }
